(SELECT facebookPostId, count(id) as facebookLikes FROM FacebookLike GROUP BY facebookPostId)
(SELECT facebookPostId, count(id) as facebookComments FROM FacebookComment GROUP BY facebookPostId)

mapper.select:
SELECT FROM Retailer R LEFT OUTER JOIN Echo E ON R.id = E.retailerId LEFT OUTER JOIN FacebookPost FBP ON E.id=FBP.echoId LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBL ON FBL.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBC ON FBC.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
EC ON E.id = EC.echoId WHERE R.id = #{retailerId} GROUP BY R.id, R.name, E.productId, E.productName, E.brand, E.category ORDER BY totalEchoes DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT FROM Retailer R LEFT OUTER JOIN Echo E ON R.id = E.retailerId LEFT OUTER JOIN FacebookPost FBP ON E.id=FBP.echoId LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBL ON FBL.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBC ON FBC.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
EC ON E.id=EC.echoId WHERE R.id = #{retailerId} AND E.productId = #{productId} GROUP BY R.id, R.name, E.productId, E.productName, E.brand, E.category

SELECT R.id as retailerId, R.name as retailerName, EU.id as echoedUserId, EU.name as echoedUserName, count(E.id) as totalEchoes, coalesce(sum(FBL.facebookLikes), 0) as totalFacebookLikes, coalesce(sum(FBC.facebookComments), 0) as totalFacebookComments, coalesce(sum(EC.echoClicks), 0) as totalEchoClicks, coalesce(FF.facebookFriends, 0) as totalFacebookFriends FROM Retailer R LEFT OUTER JOIN Echo E ON R.id = E.retailerId LEFT OUTER JOIN EchoedUser EU ON E.echoedUserId = EU.id LEFT OUTER JOIN FacebookPost FBP ON E.id = FBP.echoId LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBL ON FBL.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBC ON FBC.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
EC ON E.id = EC.echoId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT FacebookUser.echoedUserId, count(FacebookFriend.id) as facebookFriends FROM FacebookUser LEFT OUTER JOIN FacebookFriend ON FacebookUser.id = FacebookFriend.facebookUserId GROUP BY FacebookUser.echoedUserId) FF ON FF.echoedUserId=EU.id WHERE R.id = #{retailerId} GROUP BY R.id, R.name, EU.id, EU.name;

SELECT R.id as retailerId, R.name as retailerName, count(E.id) as totalEchoes, coalesce(sum(FBL.facebookLikes), 0) as totalFacebookLikes, coalesce(sum(FBC.facebookComments), 0) as totalFacebookComments, coalesce(sum(EC.echoClicks), 0) as totalEchoClicks FROM Retailer R LEFT OUTER JOIN Echo E ON R.id = E.retailerId LEFT OUTER JOIN FacebookPost FBP ON E.id=FBP.echoId LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBL ON FBL.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
FBC ON FBC.facebookPostId = FBP.id LEFT OUTER JOIN
EC ON E.id=EC.echoId WHERE R.id = #{retailerId} GROUP BY R.id, R.name
